competitors.name: Cisco Webex
competitors.notes: One of the most well-known alternatives to Zoom, established player in corporate video conferencing with impressive boardroom and office credentials

competitors.name: Skype
competitors.notes: Go-to platform for personal video chat released in beta in 2003, one of the biggest Zoom competitors from day one

competitors.name: GoToMeeting
competitors.notes: Established video conferencing platform with screen sharing features and simple user experience

context: Zoom was launched in 2011 as a cloud-based video conferencing platform offering an intuitive user experience with high-quality audio and video capabilities. At the time of its founding, the video conferencing market was dominated by established players like Cisco Webex, Skype, and GoToMeeting. Zoom entered as a challenger seeking to improve on ease of use and call quality compared to the incumbents.
